website_summaries.verdict: JBL has improved both LED light show and sound in the Pulse 2, making this flashy Bluetooth speaker a stand-out product in a crowded market.
pros: The JBL Pulse 2 is a compact splashproof wireless Bluetooth speaker that delivers strong sound for its size and distinguishes itself with an integrated light show that's far improved from the original model
The built-in rechargeable battery offers 10 hours of battery for sound only and 5 hours with the light show in effect

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound! These are the best speakers we have purchased. We will be using them for press conferences, events, etc. UPDATE: Less than a year old and the speaker continuously loses connection. Very irritating. In searching for an answer, I found this is a HUGE problem with these speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Irma Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, entertaining but lousy design
customer_reviews.text: At first, It was a 5 stars since I was very happy with the product. It sounds great with deep base and the light show is very entertaining. in fact, i bought two within two months. Then i have discovered a major design flaw on both products: The charging connection is becoming loose to the point that we have to move it slightly for the unit to start charging and a simple movement of the speaker and it stops charging. In fact, we just lost complete charging capability now/ I'll see with JBL what they can do since it should be under warranty. Hopefully, they have a good customer service. For that simple reason, i can't recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Patsss

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, Firmware update needed!
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth suddenly quit working after correctly operating after 7 months on 2 separate speakers. Will not connect when pressing Bluetooth button, but instead light show button begins flashing and cannot be discovered. Tried aux connection directly wired to MP3 player, but still no sound. Terribly disappointed since I spent approx. $150 each (on two pulse 2 speakers) only to experience the same problem on both. Checked online and discovered a firmware update would fix the problem. Needed to relocate speakers beyond range of interference before establishing Bluetooth connection and performing firmware update (ver. 6.6).
customer_reviews.author: JNB

customer_reviews.title: I have a friend who always throws the best parties and he has 2 or 3 of these ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend who always throws the best parties and he has 2 or 3 of these constantly on and floating around the house and back patio. The lights add an awesome ambiance and the sound is just incredible. This speaker can play pretty loud, even when outside, and the sound is incredibly dynamic. When my hubby and I decided to get a bluetooth speaker, this was a no-brainer. We looked briefly at other options, but nothing else compared. I'd just warn that there isn't really a great spot to hold onto the speaker without touching the perforations and potentially pushing dirt into them, so make sure your hands are clean and dry to keep it looking nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Downing

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first, but it's 4 months and it won't hold a charge...sometimes it won't even charge at all. I am using the charger that was included with the speaker. I expected to be able to use this for longer than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: jhart

customer_reviews.title: Will not last beyond a year
customer_reviews.text: This is the second JBL speaker I have gotten that only gives me about a year of good life. The first one works but only if it stays plugged in and that's about 90% of the time. I didn't buy that one on Amazon but it was a JBL. This one in particular worked about a year but after that it would hold a charge for about an hour and then die. Most of the time I could use it while plugged in and now it won't work either way. I won't buy JBL again, I went ahead got a small Bose speaker this time.
customer_reviews.author: je55ic4

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! I got it for my 15 year old son for Christmas. He downloaded an app on his phone that allows him to control the speaker. He can change it to different light schemes, change the volume, etc. It is very easy to take- he took it to a Christmas party and played a plethora of Christmas music. I also love that it is semi waterproof, so he can take it with him when he showers, and I don't have to worry about anything spilling on it. I would recommend this to anyone who likes to play music.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moran

customer_reviews.title: Died!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas present for my Grandson, he mentioned yesterday 1/31 that it wasn't working. Thank goodness he did, I had only that day to set up a return. Sent back today at UPS. IT wouldn't charge and when plugged in and press on it would start then die. Too bad it was a nice wireless speaker, but when it doesn't work, it's just a paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Shitty battery/connection
customer_reviews.text: Battery died after 5-6 months! Micro USB has connection problem, it needs to be carefully moved slightly in order to charge, but even if it looks like it’s charging, it won’t turn on! What the heck??? This is the 2nd one I bought! I had to return the 1st one for pairing issues! I am pretty pissed because otherwise it would be a great speaker! Sound quality is pretty good! I lost $$$ I put in it less than 6 months! Speaker is useless! Oh, and it often started blinking and stopped playing! Why the heck is that??? A total failure for me!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: I am writing another review. I bought this in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am writing another review. I bought this in May of 2017...It is now October 2017. My JBL no longer charges!! for the amount of money i had paid I feel this is unexcusable!! The seller no longer warranties this product. This is not a consumer wear & tear! I only played my JBL on the weekends & not every weekend! I just feel it way to much money esp if it lasts for 5 months!!
customer_reviews.author: tehoff

customer_reviews.title: Speaker dump!
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck. Battery last a long time and the bass is legit! Absolutely big noise for a smell speaker. Love the custom lights and portability Update: I bought this speaker back in Dec. 2017, the speaker doesn’t stay connected to my iPhone (my phone isn’t the problem). I have other Bluetooth items connected working perfectly. Be careful w/ the price of the speaker b/c you are better off buying from Bestbuy w/ the protection plan. This is quite annoying!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's mom

customer_reviews.title: WARNING:  Battery and/or Battery Charge Cable Cannot Be Replaced!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: Battery and/or Battery Charge Cable Cannot Be Replaced! I have had my Pulse 2 for about 18 months. Three months ago I noticed the charge was no taking. It appears the charge cable is broken (somewhere) and I cannot find replacement parts. It is almost comical the number of reviews that show how difficult it would be to attempt to replace the battery. I feel duped and hurt because I really love this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki J. Elder

customer_reviews.title: Broken product and no customer support
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first. But after a few months it would no longer charge. I changed cables and still nothing. I tried to do a warranty exchange through jbl and I have heard nothing back from them since November. I could get it to charge if I plugged the cable in just right but now it won’t and it is completely dead. I’m going back to my Bose speakers. Horrible battery life even with the lights off and even worse is the customer service from jbl. Stay away
customer_reviews.author: Josh Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great sound- pretty light display
customer_reviews.text: The charging port on this device gets loose very quickly. This was my second attempt at purchasing the Portable Pulse 2 JBL speaker. I was hoping that the charging port issue was just a isolated incident. It isn't. The port stops working and then the speaker will not charge any longer and becomes a very expensive paperweight. Great sound- pretty light display. However some technology needs to be addressed with the charging port for me to ever recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sounds are awesome. Can hook up two via WiFi and have stereo anywhere. I found that the music can get blippy if you are using strictly wifi connection​ if there are alot of people walking around. So I plugged my iPod directly into one and used an electrical outlet to power while using WiFi to connect the 2nd and had no issues. I thought there was a short in one of the speakers but it took a few trial runs to figure this out. I used this for an outdoor party and it was great. The light show is kinda cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Nolaluziana

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is compact and has good sound. The lights are fun. They don't appear to coordinate to the music but maybe they aren't intended to. The speaker is well built and feels like a quality product. I highly recommend this speaker for office, home, or outdoor use. Note that if you need super loud sound it may not be what you are looking for. In very noisy environments I had the volume all the way up and it still wasn't quite loud enough. However, in normal environments the sound is plenty loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great,  But I think the USB port is made of used egg shell.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound, and the ability to pair it with other JBL speakers, but the USB port is terribly delicate. Adult owned and used.. Im going to try one of the magnetic cables this time to see if I can get more than two months of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Cool speaker. Cool sound
customer_reviews.text: Cool speaker. Cool sound. But not comparable with Bose for example. The light show its better than the previous model but it seems that its independent from the played music. I would have liked that it had an option like an equalizer light show.. and also I was hoping that they will release some other new patterns. I was buying it as a present for my brother and I played with it before giving it to him. If u don’t aim for a deeper bass the light show will let’s say “compensate”.. Considering the price I think is a very good choice.
customer_reviews.author: andrei s.

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for my gf and we are both amazed at the sound that comes out of this little ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my gf and we are both amazed at the sound that comes out of this little device... It's quite amazing actually! Highs, lows, etc, all amazing given the size. The light-show that populates on the exterior when music is played definitely improves your listening experience. Lights are usually a gimmick, and I suppose this one is too... but what a gimmick it is! it's done very well done and coincides with the music perfectly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It's a bluetooth speaker that can't do bluetooth connectivity right
customer_reviews.text: It regularly loses connection when I connect it wirelessly to my computers. So frustrating. The light feature and the app is cool and all, but if it can't even do the basic bluetooth connectivity speaker thing right, why even bothering with all the other gimmicks. I do not recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Chan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice high quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality sound. Does not sound as great as the JBL Charge 3, but it is smaller and sounds very good. Way much better than the Amazon Echo. One thing to mention is that it's not really 360 degrees sound. You must point the front of the speaker (where the jbl logo is) in order to get the bass correctly, that's no issue for me but might be for someone out there.
customer_reviews.author: GGeorge

customer_reviews.title: TechNoLogic is not an authorized distributor to sell JBL Products
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a JBL Pulse 2 from you through Amazon on 1/111/2020 and received on 1/17/2020 and it’s defective . Under normal circumstances , it would be replace under the manufactures warranty, because it’s under a year old, in fact I’ve only owned it for 2.5 months. But it turns out TechNoLogic is NOT AN AUTHORIZED DISTRIBUTOR so I can’t get my Product (Pulse 2) that I bought from you brand new replaced or repaired under warranty. I feel I’ve been lied to and screwed. This is not cool what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Luis S.

customer_reviews.title: Used for about 4 hours after burning in with white ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for about 4 hours after burning in with white noise on 50% volume, been having issues with audio quality and a static hum on higher volume. Been using Hi-Fi FLAC songs and 320 KBPS songs on aux and bluetooth and still have audio crackling. This was tested on a factory restored galaxy S8 and iphone 8. I restarted the speaker, drained the battery completely and fully charged with issues still. Also upgraded firmware on my phones and speaker. The high frequencies sound too bright with some distortion at high volume im guessing damage from the constant hum thats so common with these. Will be returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: David miller

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a year
customer_reviews.text: Well it didn’t quite last a year, first I though just the Bluetooth was going out on it, then realized that the speaker itself just randomly stops playing music. Disappointing because I was hoping the quality would be better than beats, I’ve had issues with their reliability as well. Will try sonos maybe, very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Haro

customer_reviews.title: Would like to contact seller to resolve
customer_reviews.text: Stopped connecting after 3 months of light use. It goes into crazy lights mode and stops playing music. Loved the product at first but it seems to have a glitch. It’s only been used indoors for a few months and charged regularly. Amazon isn’t showing any seller contact info but I’d like to get this sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: BossLady

customer_reviews.title: Dead after only 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: Sounded good, I liked the color show, but it doesn’t work anymore. Not sure I’ll keep buying JBL products. They don’t seem to be built to last. This speaker was stationed in my kitchen. I wasn’t rough with it. The most I moved it was to different rooms in my house. Not sure why it’s dead already.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Very good Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale and I've never looked back! I've wanted one ever since the Pulse 1, but $200 for basically a speaker to pair with my Echo Dot just seemed silly so I held off until I saw this one! The lighting is really a nice bonus, but it's the sound I fell in love with. It sounds so rich and even has some pretty good bass sounds. It's a little on the heavy side, but not so heavy that it will matter if you want to take it out and about, but is a consideration. Battery life is excellent and since I'm using it for my Echo leaving it plugged in and on has worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Valorus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love my JBL Pulse 2. I use it most through my cell phone bluetooth to make and take phone calls. I never have a problem hearing or being heard and I can take it anywhere and do anything hands free while talking on the phone. The battery charge lasts a long time. Music is clear and sound is awesome for such a small speaker. The light show is a bonus. I'm very happy with it and glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: dewsurf

customer_reviews.title: Sad, because the speaker looks really nice but unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: After one month of use it has started malfuctioning. It turns off and does not turn on or it gets stuck in the demo mode. I have checked on the Internet and many have the same problem. Sad, because the speaker looks really nice but unfortunately it seems it does not last long.
customer_reviews.author: JEA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no Bluetooth issues, is truly splashproof, and sounds amazing for this size of speaker. The main issue is that it's difficult to clean stuff out of the grill on the LED portion of the speaker. Make sure it stays far away from cheese, cake, or any other greasy/staining foods.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Yilmaz

customer_reviews.title: The product didn't work out of the box - the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't work out of the box - the bluetooth connection dropped after a few seconds everytime I tried to play a song. I had to perform a firmware upgrade to make it work properly. Now, just two months later, the buttons stopped performing their functions and all of just turn the color sensor. I tried to reset the equipment as requested by Harman's tech support, but the buttons don't execute their original functions, so I wasn't able to do so. I'll update this review if I'm able to make this speaker work again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Priced right!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for my husband. Good sound quality with good bass. It's very loud so you don't need to turn the volume up as high as other brands/styles.Love the color show. Fantastic buy and best of all arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: B M.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and the battery seems to have a decent life. Also, and this, for me, is genius, JBL made the USB cable and plug in charger orange. Why is that genius? Well, if you saw my draw full of USB cables and plug in chargers, you'd know.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis314

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely hate this speaker
customer_reviews.text: The most frustrating blue tooth enabled device of any kind that I have ever owned, hands down. I can get it to work for short periods of time, but then no matter what combination of reset techniques I use to try and get the blue tooth to work, nothing seems to help. Absolutely hate this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob R McClain

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker with decent bass
customer_reviews.text: Nice speaker for under one hundred dollars. The light show is a nice plus. For those who care about the technical side, this speaker produces bass through a passive radiator as opposed to the more common port. This gives a nice bass, not down in the 30’s but nice enough, that is more accurate than ported.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I LOOOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This came wonderfully packaged and it's an all round great product! The sound is clear, loud and amazing! The bass is great also. There a USB port so that it can be charged that way along with the charger it comes with. I will definitely be buying this a gain, I got this one as a gift for someone and the loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Faulty charging port
customer_reviews.text: Battery died after 11 months. Micro USB has connection problem, it needs to be carefully moved slightly in order to charge, but even if it looks like it’s charging, it won’t turn on! After jiggling it and taping it down tighter, it charged for a day, but now won't work at all. This seems to be a trend with this product. Trying to figure out how to resolve it... next steps, I'm going to contact JBL.
customer_reviews.author: kandrews

customer_reviews.title: I woldn't buy twice
customer_reviews.text: Believe me, I love good sound and the JBL pulse 2 has a nice sound with very little distortion in it, but after 3 months of good use, the charge port didn't make it, it is poor made and in the repair, you might lose your product! But you always can pay for the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Diaz

customer_reviews.title: No support from manufacturer with this problem I submitted
customer_reviews.text: The charging jack on the unit was faulty, it wasn’t secured to the unit well enough to withstand connecting the usb plug more than a dozen times before it started to get bad charging connection! I’m not the only one who’s had this same problem. Need to connect to customer service for refund return label . Refund was approved TY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best quality Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker!! I had another pulse 2 but it's charging port got messed up so I bought another one because I love it so much!! The bluetooth connect to your phine almost instantly every time and when someone calls you while you are connected to it the speaker itself becomes the phone and you can listen and talk through it! This speaker is top quality very clear audio awesome LED lights around the whole speaker that just add icing to the cake
customer_reviews.author: USACKOFTERD2345

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Pulse 2 speaker for my son. He absolutely loves it. It is an amazing speaker with fantastic sound. The various light shows are amazing as well. My daughter is wanting one now. The shipping was fast and packaged securely. He could not have picked a greater speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Wkay

customer_reviews.title: Better than 3
customer_reviews.text: This item, in my opinion, is so much better looking than the pulse 3; and the price is extremely reasonable. I'm thinking about getting another one before they're no longer available. The seller provided a new item. The battery-life is as advertised. It arrived in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful, the sound is really awesome and you get ...
customer_reviews.text: Talk about freaky fast delivery!! I literally just ordered this Saturday night and chose the free shipping and got it Monday—36 hours later!!! It’s beautiful, the sound is really awesome and you get a few different options when it comes to the light show. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Boom Boom Boom
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this! Where does all that bass come from???? And, it's pretty darn loud for it's size!!! I would buy again for sure. But this whole camera thing is a total gimmick with no purpose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews4U

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth speaker ever
customer_reviews.text: My son and I literally use this speaker for everything all the time. It’s plenty loud enough and you can set it to change different colors to the bass in a song.
customer_reviews.author: Cataphoria420

customer_reviews.title: Was great... didn’t last a year
customer_reviews.text: Was great speaker... but I’ve had it almost exactly one year and it doesn’t stay connected via Bluetooth. Only a few minutes it plays and disconnects automatically.
customer_reviews.author: MEGAN

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was great for about a year. But for the price, you would hope it would last longer. It will not hold a charge for long and the charging cord doesn't seem to connect anymore, therefore we struggle to even charge it. Sent the company a message and the only response I received back was that it was no longer under warranty. No suggestions on how to fix it. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: james kroner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome item if you like to have something a little different than plain speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Cool effects, good sound. Would have liked if it actually synched to the music which it does not, you select predetermined patterns that it follows. A feature that we did not know it has, you can select some of the predetermined patterns such as "campfire" and along with the lights moving in a pattern to replicate flames, it will also play the sound of a crackling fire. Did the same with a "rain" setting, it replicated rain with the lights and provided a sound bit of falling rain. Made for a very cool night light for my young daughter on a trip away from the home. I like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Speaker= Crazy beats!!
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing of this item is the time from purchase to delivered. I opened the box and was blown away! (Literally) The sound quality is unmatched by all my pervious speakers. The light selections in it are awesome. The Bluetooth is a perfect 1:1 ratio. No delay or skip!! I will only leave this last bit of advice for anyone looking for a new speaker. If you don't want a JBL pulse 2 that lights up, then buy a bigger one!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Danielson jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker around the house and with the kids
customer_reviews.text: The kids love to watch the colors while we dance to my Spotify mixes. Very loud, got it on sale so it's quite a good product at the price point. Worth up to $100 bucks, excellent Wi-Fi distance. No fifth start because it's not the loudest pill shaped standing speaker out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the speedy shipping and awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Item came as described, I had another one before but sold it on craigslist. Ended up finding one on here bought it. Exactly the same, if anyone has concerns about it being the actual brand, this is. Thanks for the speedy shipping and awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: maarcoooo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is GREAT. bought it to replace an earlier model that was lost. visual effects are great and sound is better than ever! BEST PART? the battery life is AMAZING! I can't tell you how long it will last for sure but I played it for 7 hours over two sittings and it still showed half the battery left!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatest purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is so cool and mezmoring, the app is amazing too, try the canvas setting and draw pictures on your phone and watch them show up in the lights pulsing to the music. It's freaking awesome, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Heider

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 yr. old for Christmas and my 27 yr. old liked it and bought himself one. Durable, good sound, and cool lights which go on with the beat of the music. The only thing that would make this great speaker better is if it were waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: KimmyK

customer_reviews.title: The Pulse has loud clear sound and was every easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to use in her headstart class. The setup she had to show video's to the childen was not loud enough. The Pulse has loud clear sound and was every easy to setup. The kids loved the color changes on it as well. The only problem she had was that the pc the school has does not have bluetooth, so I had to go pick up a bluetooth dongle. I read reviews before purchasing and saw people commenting about problems setting it up. I had no problems at all. I would recommend JBL Pulse 2 to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H Smith

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Within a year the charging port broke and it was made unuseable.
customer_reviews.author: Schumi23

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This speaker stopped charging after 13 months....The warranty listed on the sales page of amazon stated a 5 year warranty. The seller refuses to honor their warranty. I'm trying to get help from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: nmk8274

customer_reviews.title: JBL 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my fiance last christmas. Uses it all the time with out any problems. Fantastic sound quality with some base. We love JBL
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Could have been four stars
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker but wish it was a bit louder than I expected indoors. But the problem is after a couple of months it doesn't hold a charge. If you don't have it leaning against something to allow the cord to stay in place long enough. The 10 hour claim is bull most I got was 5.5 hours with the lights turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Grind

customer_reviews.title: It's cool, it lights up to the beat of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas because he was always stealing mine. It's cool, it lights up to the beat of the music and changes color to match whatever it's near. Great sound and durable.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Really liked this speaker but a few months after purchasing this speaker, it wasn't charging well. Now its to the point where i haven't been able to charge at all. Has been completely dead for a couple of months. I purchase thos speaker April 1st of 2018. Recieved it a few day later. Not even a year and its not working
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Doesn’t stay connected to Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Disconnects from Bluetooth consistently always. Battery will be full yet will still disconnect from speaker witthin a few seconds. Can’t play music for longer than a few minutes at best.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Charging port no good
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased two of these because after about a year the charging port becomes loose and you can't charge it anymore I will not be buying a third one
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but glitchy
customer_reviews.text: I love the speaker but it does not always function which can be very bothersome. For the most part the speaker works very well. Sometimes the Bluetooth does not work on it and other times the lights and sound will randomly stop working even though it’s fully charged. This only happens about once to twice a week and last for like an hour. This is coming from a person who listens to music all day at work and at home (about 6 hours a day). I wish this didn’t happen bc otherwise the speaker is amazing with amazing sound!! Also as stated there are some cosmetic damages.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Sone loves and still used years later
customer_reviews.text: Great little portable speaker. Newer models but this one is compact and easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Blew out
customer_reviews.text: Blew out after a few months and the charging cable doesn’t always connect fully, really ticked off I spent the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, fantastic colors and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and the color animation and patterns are really mesmerizing. We take it out to the fire pit and pool and play music through it from my iPhone. Love it. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Figie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 days
customer_reviews.text: Received this speaker 6 days ago, it was great but now it stopped working. First the Bluetooth stopped working and now I can’t turn the speaker on. I’ve fully charged it but when I unplug the powe cord it turns off, when charging it still doesn’t connect via Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Berglind Arnadottir

customer_reviews.title: Love the Quality and Portability.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several JBL Pulse Portables. Love the quality and portability. Wasn't ready for the various colors that come from the speaker, but they are kind of fun.
customer_reviews.author: LisaQ

customer_reviews.title: be careful when inserting the charging cable!
customer_reviews.text: The previous JBL pulse 2 speaker I had would not charge anymore I think it was the charging port where you insert the charging cable so be careful when inserting the charging cable. But I loved this speaker so I had to buy another one. I can tell is a refurbished and not brand new but it works great. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aron Graterol

customer_reviews.title: JBL Pulse 2
customer_reviews.text: to my point of view JBL Pulse 2 looks better than the latest Pulse 3 and it is smaller, pulse 3 just look like a glossy dildo ( if I may say ) thought I am a strong supporter of Bose I still find the JBL Pulse 2, an interesting traveling companion for just about any occasion it is without doubts a nice gadget
customer_reviews.author: lucat

customer_reviews.title: Warranty coverage is lackluster
customer_reviews.text: USB charging port became unusable after 18 months and when I contacted JBL for warranty service it was denied.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound and better battery life
customer_reviews.text: All good. It’s my dad’s birthday gifts. He is so happy
customer_reviews.author: WannianGhost

customer_reviews.title: Died after one year!
customer_reviews.text: It was okay sound-wise, too much bass though. It deserves no stars since it died after only 1 year despite trying all trouble shooting suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles

customer_reviews.title: Great for teens - nice sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and it is a huge hit. You can program it to match different colors in sync with the music. Sound is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: BaRBaRa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker! I would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker! I would recommend this to anyone. The colors are neat to watch, the sound quality is fairly decent. It does struggle with the lows of bass but I think it sounds good still. Be sure to download the JBL companion app too.
customer_reviews.author: ARIMIL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last, only 1-year warrant, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Speaker started having power issues after year-1, and would not stay on at year 1.5. Product warranty only 1-year. Was told by JBL customer service to google a local repair shop to have it repaired and I would have to foot the bill. For $150+ speaker, expect it last longer than 1.5-years and get better support when it stops working. Will be changing brands for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wrzesinski

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love this Bluetooth speaker! Big sound from this little speaker can't get over how this little thing can fill a room with sound, even using it outside can't believe how great it sounds!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Would love to return this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife for Christmas 2017 and it has just been replaced. Sounded great when it played. Connected to power the speaker DIED as if it was running on battery. This happened constantly for the last year. Wish I could return it. Name brand piece of garbage
customer_reviews.author: Craig Babino

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Speaker Box was resealed. Looks new inside but won’t know until after my daughter unwraps it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will say though that I loved this speaker very much and used it almost everyday
customer_reviews.text: Bought Speaker December 2016, it is now 2018, and unfortunately it longer works. It only turns on if plugged into its charger, and even then, it doesn't respond to "on" button, or volume buttons. It cannot pair with my phone and is just completely unresponsive with and without the charger. I will say though that I loved this speaker very much and used it almost everyday. It has great volume and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: incredibly portable (and FUN!! ) speaker
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous sound for such a small, incredibly portable (and FUN!!) speaker. Husband and I are very impressed. Buying a second speaker today to connect for even more sound and light immersion. Great for smaller spaces like apts. HIGHLY recommended 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: kittymonkey

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, but the speaker might have some issues. Might be worth investing a few more bucks for a more reliable device.
customer_reviews.text: Just got the speaker, paid $69. Way too good of a deal. Worked great for about 3 hours. Lights on device have stopped working. Great deal for the price but im not rolling the dice hoping not to get a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Shola

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic speaker. I love the sound it creates and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic speaker. I love the sound it creates and the lights are fun too. It was easy to connect to my phone. I want to get more.
customer_reviews.author: Xtian

customer_reviews.title: My favorite and trust worthy bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Pairs almost instantly, battery lasts forever, beautiful glow and just use it sometimes for light to create a romantic moment.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Josha

customer_reviews.title: Only good for a little while
customer_reviews.text: I got this speaker and loved it! Until the charging port stopped working. I can no longer charge the speaker, therefore rendering the product useless. $100 on something that lasted a couple months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CodyJoe82

customer_reviews.title: Really cool speaker. very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: loveee my pulse. i bring it to work and get a lot of compliments. connects fast with bluetooth and the app offers many different themes, like fire (with actual fireplace sounds!!), fireworks, rain and a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Loving it more that the version 3
customer_reviews.text: Had to upgrade the firmware. This unit is a lot bugged with the stock one. After that, work very good. Awesome sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius Paes

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This speaked doesn’t always work, it constantly loses connection to your phone or will just cut out on music, plus it won’t pair to another speaker without ruining the music, only reason I’m not giving it 1 star is I did enjoy it, WHEN IT ACTUALLY WORKED.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisC.

customer_reviews.title: Unable to charge the speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was worthless. The charging cord did not fit the speaker properly. Within 3 months of purchase, it was impossible to charge. I tried buying a universal charge cord. That didn't work either. I waited too long and was not able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Thus thing stopped working after 2 weeks of use. ...
customer_reviews.text: Thus thing stopped working after 2 weeks of use. Gave as a Christmas present. Now it won't pair, does not charge, etc. After looking up online, seems to be a common issue with battery and this model. Expensive paperweight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Charging
customer_reviews.text: I use speaker for outdoor entertainment. It no longer charges, I bought a replacement charger thinking it was that but still does not charge. Very disappointed. I wish I could return it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: Battery charging issues
customer_reviews.text: Less than 6 months old and battery won't charge any more. Even plugged in, it bluetooth seems to not work. Was great prior to this, but I see I'm not the only one to have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Swimszoots

customer_reviews.title: BUYING ONE FOR MYSELF.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. I purchased the openboxed and for husband. Great condition. Thinking about buying a secound for myself. The charger is heavy duty and orange, a plus when having so many chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Asher Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Great sound with perfect bass Only the sound is more like mono rather than stereo The lights are fabulous and it has an application to control from your mobile Somehow heavy not that lightweight But it deserves for the outcome
customer_reviews.author: sara foda

customer_reviews.title: It's very good quality, great bass
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old daughter mentioned she wanted a Bose speaker or this JBL speaker for Christmas. I went with this speaker because of the lighting and just a hunch she'd prefer it. She loves it and was very grateful I got her JBL over Bose. She brings it everywhere and gets lots of compliments. It's very good quality, great bass, fun display and looks sleak.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA KRONBERG

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and is fantastic how it changes color like ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. I bought it for my son. He loves it ! Very good sound and is fantastic how it changes color like a Chameleon ! I truly recommend this device.!
customer_reviews.author: Eilin

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound, however I purchased this in November 2016 the charge port started having issues around March. I never moved it from the same spot in my living room. It now will not charge at all. So it's a very expensive paper weight!! Wouldn't buy. I have also had issues with shortages in wireless JBL headphones. Done with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Althea Acoff

customer_reviews.title: JBL
customer_reviews.text: I loved this. This is a great product at this prjcr. The sound quality is great and also splash proof...great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sunvik Chandan

customer_reviews.title: Wont charge, usb port broke after being used 6 times
customer_reviews.text: Terrible build quality on a great product. Only it was used 6 times. The usb port wont charge, it broke down by itself, no damage was done to it. 1 star. It is a common issue on this device. Just google search for "jbl pulse 2 won't charge". Extremely dissapointed. Go for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Falzone

product_meta.title: JBL Pulse 2 Portable Splashproof Bluetooth Speaker, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackJBL Pulse 2 Portable Splashproof Bluetooth Speaker, Black
feature_bullets: Elevate your music experience to another dimension with the JBL Pulse 2 a portable Bluetooth speaker that offers sensational sound with an interactive light show
Bring your music to life with glowing multi-colored visuals and transform wherever you are into a Party
Take full Control of your Pulse 2 light show using JBL Prism color sensor lens. Just point and shoot the lens at the color you want and watch the Pulse 2 amplify the colors of life
The splashproof design enables the Pulse 2 to light up any stage or show with high-quality stereo sound for up to 10 hours of playtime thanks to its built-in 6000Mah rechargeable li-ion battery
Pulse 2 also features a noise and Echo cancelling speakerphone for Crystal clear calls.Audio Specifications : Signal-to-Noise Ratio >80dB Frequency Response 85Hz – 20 kHz

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars908 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
